description:
Redevelopment of former Savoy Cinema site by the erection of a 5 storey (plus basement) building to provide a 125 bed hotel (Class C1) incorporating a restaurant, bar area on the ground floor fronting onto Westway, ancillary meeting room facilities, associated basement car parking for 20 parking spaces with vehicular access from Old Oak Road junction with Foxglove Street, and hard and soft landscaping.
 
 (Revised Design - revisions include set back of southern end of building by 3.6m at all levels, set back of fourth floor by 1.2m on main facades at west and east elevations, removal of windows on southern elevation adjacent to junction with Foxglove Street, alterations to rear east west elevation including removal of a bedroom and provision of new windows)
